items.title: Trump envoy Witkoff to head to Russia for 'last chance' Ukraine ceasefire talks
items.description: President Donald Trump's special envoy Steve Witkoff is expected to travel to Russia later this week, the president told reporters on Sunday.

items.title: ABC starts broadcasting with new affiliate in Miami
items.description: ABC programming will air on channel 7 in the Miami-Fort Lauderdale market.

items.title: Texas Republicans say 'hunt down' Democrats who are leaving state over redistricting
items.description: Texas state House Democrats plan to leave to break quorum of a special session in which Republicans aim to pass a new congressional map that could net...

items.title: WATCH:  Rescued sea turtle returned to ocean after treatment
items.description: Pennywise, a large sea turtle that was found injured along the Florida coast in May following a boat strike, has been returned to the ocean.

items.title: WATCH:  Groom surprises bride and her parents with ASL vows on wedding day
